Community contribution
Many community members have contributed to the creation of this tool and continue to collaborate on the project. In addition, the mapping tool provides a resource that anyone can contribute to as citizen scientists, with their own data, observations and knowledge.
Make an observation (iNaturalist)

title: Web of Life
text: The Web of Life is an interactive visualisation based on a working species list of observations made on Galiano Island. Please note that it is a work in progress that may contain errors and redundancies, and that is continually subject to review with assistance from various taxonomic authorities.
